mapper.sql: self.DAMAGE_DETAIL_ID, self.DAMAGE_ID, self.DAMAGE_POSITION_ID, self.DAMAGE_DEGREE, self.DAMAGE_REGISTRATION, self.DAMAGE_CAUSE_CN, self.DAMAGE_CAUSE_EN, self.DAMAGE_DATE, self.REMARK, self.CORP_ID, self.FLAG, position.POSITION_NAME_CN as refPositionNameCN

where self.DEL = 0 and DAMAGE_DETAIL_ID = #{damageDetailId} and DAMAGE_ID = #{damageId} and DAMAGE_POSITION_ID = #{damagePositionId} and DAMAGE_DEGREE = #{damageDegree} and DAMAGE_REGISTRATION = #{damageRegistration} and DAMAGE_CAUSE_CN = #{damageCauseCn} and DAMAGE_CAUSE_EN = #{damageCauseEn} and DAMAGE_DATE = #{damageDate} and REMARK = #{remark} and CORP_ID = #{corpId} and FLAG = #{flag}
mapper.select: select from sq_common_damage_detail self left join sq_damage_position position on self.DAMAGE_POSITION_ID = position.POSITION_ID where self.DAMAGE_DETAIL_ID = #{damageDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and self.DEL = 0
mapper.update: update sq_common_damage_detail set DEL = 1 where DAMAGE_DETAIL_ID = #{damageDetailId}
mapper.insert: insert into sq_common_damage_detail (DAMAGE_ID, DAMAGE_POSITION_ID, DAMAGE_DEGREE, DAMAGE_REGISTRATION, DAMAGE_CAUSE_CN, DAMAGE_CAUSE_EN, DAMAGE_DATE, REMARK, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{damageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{damagePositionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{damageDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{damageRegistration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{damageCauseCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damageCauseEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into sq_common_damage_detail DAMAGE_ID, DAMAGE_POSITION_ID, DAMAGE_DEGREE, DAMAGE_REGISTRATION, DAMAGE_CAUSE_CN, DAMAGE_CAUSE_EN, DAMAGE_DATE, REMARK, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{damageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{damagePositionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{damageDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{damageRegistration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{damageCauseCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damageCauseEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{damageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update: update sq_common_damage_detail DAMAGE_ID = #{damageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DAMAGE_POSITION_ID = #{damagePositionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DAMAGE_DEGREE = #{damageDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DAMAGE_REGISTRATION = #{damageRegistration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DAMAGE_CAUSE_CN = #{damageCauseCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAMAGE_CAUSE_EN = #{damageCauseEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAMAGE_DATE = #{damageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where DAMAGE_DETAIL_ID = #{damageDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sq_common_damage_detail set DAMAGE_ID = #{damageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DAMAGE_POSITION_ID = #{damagePositionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DAMAGE_DEGREE = #{damageDegree,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DAMAGE_REGISTRATION = #{damageRegistration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DAMAGE_CAUSE_CN = #{damageCauseCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAMAGE_CAUSE_EN = #{damageCauseEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAMAGE_DATE = #{damageDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DAMAGE_DETAIL_ID = #{damageDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from sq_common_damage_detail self left join sq_damage_position position on self.DAMAGE_POSITION_ID = position.POSITION_ID order by self.DAMAGE_DATE DESC
select DAMAGE_DETAIL_ID from sq_common_damage_detail where DAMAGE_ID = #{damageId, jdbcType=BIGINT} and DEL = 0
select from sq_common_damage_detail self left join sq_damage_position position on self.DAMAGE_POSITION_ID = position.POSITION_ID where DAMAGE_ID = #{damageId} and self.DEL = 0
